overview:
Cesar S. Cesar is an Internet and Mobile Entrepreneur. In 20 years of professional experience, he worked on projects for organizations in internet, mobile internet, wireless carriers, advertising, e-business and technology industries. Graduated in Engineering, Cesar also got specialization at Austin Software Foundry.

Cesar was involved in implementation of the first internet service provider in Brazil Alternex. Since then, he has always worked with a solid technology base. Cesar was founder and CEO at Nexxa Technologies (e-business consulting firm for top-500 Brazilian corporations), project leader at Atos Origin and internet systems architect at Coppe/UFRJ, one of the most important researches centers in Brazil.

Cesar is currently involved with trend-spotting, strategic planning and alliances, market research and development of new products and services at Hands. As a director of a pioneer mobile marketing company in Latin America and leader of Brazilian market, Cesar integrates the ability and experience to analyze the trends of mobile advertising, e-business, sales and business development.

image.attribution: Cesar S. Cesar, Strategy & Marketing Director - Hands
